notFoundedJob: Sorry I could not find the job *{{job}}*
errorOnStartJob: Sorry I could not start the job *{{job}}*. See the error in the logs.

configuration.start: Okay, I'll ask you some questions. If you need more details <https://github.com/hubot-js/gear-jenkins#configurations|*click here*>.

question.auth:
_*What is the Jenkins url?*_ The url should have this format: http://user:authToken@jenkinsUrl. 
If you do not want to make this setting now, keeping the current value, type *skip*.
question.noAuth:
_*What is the Jenkins url?*_ Just use the Jenkins access url. 
If you do not want to make this setting now, keeping the current value, type *skip*.

url.responds: Url responds. Apparently everything is alright. :champagne:
url.notResponds: I could not check the url. Something is wrong. :disappointed: Check if the url is correct.

categories.name: Jenkins Jobs
categories.description: To use Jenkins jobs use the following commands:

tasks.description: To start a job use the command next to replacing $ by job name.
